name: Reverse World (davidporos92, d_alma)
description:
After a meteor hit the Earth and messed up the time-space continuum , we went back to the prehistoric times in 2020 and everything get reversed. Reach the worm hole to get back to our days again. Think backwards to get access to active the worm hole. But be aware, some uninvited guests will try to stop you. Revert yourself, eat some meat and win!

----------

Use the keyboard arrows to controll the dino.

----------

Special thanks to:

Ryben Ahanesian for the music | https://g.co/kgs/4pzj7i

Dávid Pörös for the development | http://github.com/davidporos92

Dalma Balla for the design | https://dalmaballa.com/
